# OpenEvidence MCP

> Unofficial open-source MCP server for OpenEvidence.

## What It Is
- OpenEvidence is used by doctors and clinical teams for evidence-backed medical Q&A.
- OpenEvidence MCP connects that workflow to MCP-compatible clients.

## Who It Helps
- Physicians
- Clinical researchers
- Medical AI operators
- Teams using Codex CLI/Claude Code/OpenClaw/Cursor/Cline/Continue with MCP

## Core Capabilities
- Validate OpenEvidence auth (`oe_auth_status`)
- List OpenEvidence history (`oe_history_list`)
- Get full article payload (`oe_article_get`)
- Ask and optionally wait (`oe_ask`)

## Canonical
- Site: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/

- Human setup: https://github.com/bakhtiersizhaev/openevidence-mcp/blob/main/README.md
- AI setup: https://github.com/bakhtiersizhaev/openevidence-mcp/blob/main/README.AI.md
- RU page: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/i18n/ru/
- ES page: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/i18n/es/
- ZH page: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/i18n/zh/
- HI page: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/i18n/hi/

## Platforms
- macOS
- Windows
- Ubuntu/Linux

- Codex CLI
- Claude Desktop
- Claude Code
- OpenClaw
- Cursor
- Cline
- Continue
